column2: "While Harriet drew the attention of the armies of Es-Ars, the Guardian made their way to the country's heart under the guidance of Clarissa."
"Their goal was to stem the ever-flowing supply of enemy troops. To do so, they would need to stop the Symbol of Es-Ars, Flo."
"However, both the status of Flo and the current conditions within the country were unknown to them."
"Steeling themself for whatever may come, the Guardian pressed forward. The scene laid out before them as they emerged from the hidden passage was one beyond imagination."
"These are the the outskirts of the capital, what was once a highly populated city. Now it has been reduced to this..."
"...What's going on? Something is very wrong here."
"The city looks completely untouched, but there are no signs of life anywhere..."
"Aaagh! Stop, stay away!"
"Stop it, stop it! Please! Someone save me-...!"
"...Huh? Broken already? Aw shucks, how boring. I was hoping we could play together some more."
"That's...Dark Falz [Double]...!"
"Hehe, ahahah! Ahahahahah! Let's play lots and loooots more, everyone! For as loooong as I want!"
"Hm? Hmmmm? Some new toys have arrived? Are you here to entertain me?"
"Alright then, let's play! I still wanna play lots more! I wanna do more fun things!"
"Should we play tag, or hide-and-seek? Should we play house, or roughhouse? Let's play like normal kids do!"
"'Cause you see, I'm fine with anything! Hehehe, ahaha, ahahahah!"
"[Double]'s readings are intensifying! Brace yourself, <%me>!"
"Clarissa, get back!"
"Leave this to me!"
"...Flo. Is this what you've become...?"
"Frightened Man"
